svg.script: var emptyBinding = "url('data:text/xml,%3Cbindings%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mozilla.org%2Fxbl%22%3E%3Cbinding%20id%3D%22foo%22%3E%3Ccontent%3E%0A%0A%20%20%20%20%0A%3C%2Fcontent%3E%3C%2Fbinding%3E%3C%2Fbindings%3E%0A')"; function boom() { var foreignObject = document.getElementById("foreignObject") foreignObject.style.MozBinding = emptyBinding; document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }
